name: polyguise
description:
Create your own characters!

PolyGuise is an in depth character creator built in unity. Create your unique characters and share them online!

Currently the features include:
  • dynamically generated models and textures that allow a wide range of customizability
  • a set of different face parts to create a unique face
  • highly customizable hair
  • a (currently very small) list of clothes you can make your character wear
  • a y2k inspired low-poly pixel art-style

you can save your characters locally or save them online to your account, additionally you can export an .fbx file of your character to play around with!

Planned features for future updates:
  • a clothing editor where you can create your own custom clothing designs
  • an online plaza where you can share each others creations and take pictures
  • many many more pieces of clothing and accessories
  • custom animations and poses
  • a more robust character export that supports rigs and animations
